{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = IP, HEVC, Ultra-HD Set-Top Box with 802.11ac Wi-Fi |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.arris.com/products/vip6102w/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Arris_VIP6102W |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Arris |model = VIP6102W |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1750 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = set top box |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = ACQ-VIP6102W |icid = 109AS-VIP6102W |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM7271; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARMv8-A |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.66 GHz<!-- 1.66 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Toshiba;; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR4 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Linux;;Android TV;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = <!-- Connector Type --> |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth LE, DFS (slave), IR receiver, HDMI 2.0a, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = an+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/22/2018 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1733 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 600 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== May also be branded as ''Telus'' and ''Bell''. :Fast Ethernet is supposedly standard with GbE listed as optional.
{{FCC ST|12/19/2018|indexme.}}
==Links of Interest== *[https://sites.google.com/view/droid-tv/pay-tv-provider/bell-canada-fibe-tv ''Bell Canada Fibe TV'' on '''Android TV Guide'''] *[https://sites.google.com/view/droid-tv/oem/arris ''Android TV Products'' on '''Android TV Guide''']

*Arris Px5517 - UHD, DVR :SoC: Broadcom BCM7271 (Quad-core), 15000 DMIPS :RAM: 2GB DDR4; Storage: 8GB eMMC Flash, DVR (1TB) :Product Variants: DVB-C, DVB-T, DVB-S :Wi-Fi: 4x4 802.11ac *Arris Zx4517 - UHD :SoC: Broadcom BCM7271 (Quad-core), 15000 DMIPS :RAM: 2GB DDR4; Storage: 8GB eMMC Flash :Product Variants: DVB-C, DVB-T, DVB-S :Wi-Fi: 4x4 802.11ac *Arris Zx4515 - UHD :SoC: Broadcom BCM7271 (Quad-core), 15000 DMIPS :RAM: 2GB DDR4; Storage: 8GB eMMC Flash :Product Variants: DVB-C, DVB-T, DVB-S *Arris Zx4430 UHD :SoC: Broadcom BCM72604 (Dual-core), 7000 DMIPS :RAM: 2GB DDR4; Storage: 8GB eMMC Flash :Product Variants: DVB-C, DVB-T, DVB-S
